full_sentence: Anyone else see how many rounds hit the curb? Do these so called niggers ever sight in a weapon or go to the range? Look at how many are just wasted.
Oh my God why are two Jew high school girls bathing together
Good to see these guys! We need more black lawyers to fight the good fight!!

topics.sentence_slice: We need more black lawyers to fight the good fight

full_sentence: Knew of a guy that kept having his shop broken into. They were coming in through the roof, then through ceiling tiles. He electrified some metal under the tiles and it killed them. Shop owner went to jail. Best to do the same but instead of calling cops, dump the corpses in a ditch few miles away.

topics.sentence_slice: electrified some metal under the tiles and it killed them

full_sentence: but yeah you must be alone in order to have thoughts of your own. you can't have that when you are constantly 'connected'. what a sick mentality wanting to be surrounded people all the time. fuck them and their noise.
